title: A highly crystalline donor enables over 17% efficiency for small-molecule organic solar cell
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00400K, Paper
Tao Zhang, Cunbin An, Pengqing Bi, Kaihu Xian, Zhihao Chen, Jingwen Wang, Ye Xu, Jiangbo Dai, Lijiao Ma, Guanlin Wang, Xiao-Tao Hao, Long Ye, Shaoqing Zhang, Jianhui Hou
The development of novel small-molecule donor is crucial for achieving highly efficient small-molecule organic solar cells (SM-OSCs). In this study, two small-molecule donors, B3TR and B2, were designed and synthesized....
